headline: Apple Inc. To Boost iPad Pro Performance With Vapor Chamber Integration
summary: In a bid to enhance the performance of its iPad Pro, Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is reportedly planning to incorporate a vapor chamber into the device. This feature has been instrumental in improving the performance of the iPhone 17 Pro and Pro Max models. Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, in his latest "Power On” report revealed that the vapor chamber, a liquid-cooling system, has been a major selling point for the iPhone 17 Pro models.
